org.globus.opensaml11.md.common.provider
Class ShibbolethTrust

java.lang.Object
  org.globus.opensaml11.md.common.provider.BasicTrust
      org.globus.opensaml11.md.common.provider.ShibbolethTrust
All Implemented Interfaces:
PluggableConfigurationComponent, Trust
public class ShibbolethTrust
extends BasicTrust
implements Trust, PluggableConfigurationComponent

Trust implementation that does PKIX validation against key authorities included in shibboleth-specific extensions to SAML 2 metadata.

Author:
Walter Hoehn

Method Detail

validate

public boolean validate(X509Certificate certificateEE,
                        X509Certificate[] certificateChain,
                        RoleDescriptor descriptor)
Description copied from interface: Trust
Verifies that a certificate or ordered chain of certificates represents a valid credential set for a specific action by a specific entity.

Specified by:
validate in interface Trust
Overrides:
validate in class BasicTrust
Parameters:
certificateEE - the end-entity certificate being validated
certificateChain - additional certificates supplied by the entity (may also contain the end-entity certificate)
descriptor - the SAML 2 role descriptor of the entity purported to be performing the action
Returns:
true if the validation was successful and false if it was not successful

Verifies that a certificate or ordered chain of certificates represents a valid credential set for a specific action by a specific entity.

Specified by:
validate in interface Trust
Overrides:
validate in class BasicTrust
Parameters:
token - the signed object to validate

Returns:
true if the validation was successful and false if it was not successful

validate

public boolean validate(X509Certificate certificateEE,
                        X509Certificate[] certificateChain,
                        RoleDescriptor descriptor,
                        boolean checkName)
Description copied from interface: Trust
Verifies that a certificate or ordered chain of certificates represents a valid credential set for a specific action by a specific entity.

Specified by:
validate in interface Trust
Overrides:
validate in class BasicTrust
Parameters:
certificateEE - the end-entity certificate being validated
certificateChain - additional certificates supplied by the entity (may also contain the end-entity certificate)
descriptor - the SAML 2 role descriptor of the entity purported to be performing the action
checkName - whether the check the name of the certificate during the validation process, normally true unless the name has already been checked as part of other processing (for example, TLS)
Returns:
true if the validation was successful and false if it was not successful
